title: Test Failure with PHP 7.3
body:
https://travis-ci.org/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/jobs/330742365

```
1) /home/travis/build/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/tests/Regression/GitHub/2591-separate-function-no-preserve-no-bootstrap.phpt
Failed asserting that string matches format description.
--- Expected
+++ Actual
@@ @@
-PHPUnit\Framework\Exception: PHP Fatal error:  Class 'PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase' not found %s

+Stack trace:

+#2 {main}
+  thrown in /home/travis/build/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/tests/Regression/GitHub/2591/SeparateFunctionNoPreserveTest.php on line 8
 
 2) Issue2591_SeparateFunctionNoPreserveTest::testGlobalString
```
